capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: Responsible for delivering tasks on time, within budget, and to expected standards of quality.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Plans to achieve priority outcomes for infrastructure projects and adapts to changing circumstances.

capabilities.name: Think and Solve Problems
capabilities.description: Uses analytical skills to solve issues and improve portfolio quality.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Ensures effective communication with internal and external stakeholders.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Collaborates with various teams and business partners on infrastructure projects.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Supports project management and assurance frameworks for infrastructure projects.

capabilities.name: Technology
capabilities.description: Utilizes Excel, SQL, & BI tools for data analytics and reporting.

skills.name: Data Analytics
skills.description: Analyzing project performance data to prepare reports and advice.

skills.name: Stakeholder Management
skills.description: Establishing and maintaining relationships with internal and external stakeholders.

skills.name: Continuous Improvement
skills.description: Identifying and implementing opportunities to improve project delivery processes.

generalRole.title: Infrastructure Project Performance Specialist
generalRole.description: Specializes in monitoring and reporting on the performance of infrastructure projects within an environmental context, ensuring projects are delivered effectively and contribute to sustainable management.
